thread.title: JWoww reveals at wedding she's pregnant again, reports say
thread.title_full: JWoww reveals at wedding she's pregnant again, reports say

author: Vicki Hyman | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: JWoww reveals at wedding she's pregnant again, reports say
text:
"Jersey Shore" stars Jenni "JWoww" Farley and Roger Mathews are expecting their second child together, they announced at their wedding Sunday evening in Keyport, Entertainment Tonight and E! confirms via sources. The couple welcomed their first child Meilani Alexandra last year. 
The couple did not confirm the pregnancy to any news outlets so far, but they did tell E! following the ceremony at Keyport's Addison Park: "By far one of the best days of our lives outside Meilani being born. So blessed to have our daughter share this day with us!" 
The couple started dating on the third season of "Jersey Shore," and continued their relationship through its spinoff "Snooki & JWoww" and also endured a stint on WeTV's "Marriage Boot Camp." 
PODCAST: TV Hangover reviews the 'RHONJ: Teresa Checks In' special 
She's the second cast member to get hitched; co-star Nicole "Snooki" Polizzi married Jionni LaValle , whom she met on the show, in November 2014, two months after giving birth to their second child , Giovanna. Their son Lorenzo is three years old. Vicki Hyman may be reached at vhyman@njadvancemedia.com . Follow her on Twitter @vickihy . Find NJ.com/Entertainment on Facebook . You can also check out her podcast TV Hangover with co-host Erin Medley, in which they discuss Sunday's debut of "Teresa Checks In": TV HANGOVER, EP. 5: 'Fargo' returns, 'Crazy Ex-Girlfriend' rules and Teresa Giudice is back NJ.com TV critic Vicki Hyman and super fan Erin Medley talk top TV news, discuss returning favorites "Fargo" and gush over "Crazy Ex-Girlfriend."
